Articles.Content:
No images really needed (don\'t worry, no ponies); just Foamy\'s Tuned ASAS settings on Nova\'s ASAS model with colour coding on the texture. I\'ve done very minimalist testing so more versions may be needed.

http://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~jdamery/KSP/YSI-Tuned-ASAS-(SE).zip

Whats the problem with ponies?

I know some don\'t like them (myself included,) but they\'re easy enough to coexist with.
I have no problems with ponies, just wanted to reassure the people who do.
